name: After The Last Train is Gone
name_original: After The Last Train is Gone
description:
After The Last Train Is Gone is a short adventure, it can't probably be define as a game but as an interactive story.

It is night in London and Arthur is going to the tube station, to take the train.

Outside is dark, and the station seems like a light spot in the night.
But it is too late this time for Arthur, the train is gonna leave and Arthur is going to be stuck in the underground station, with no way out.

This is just the beginning of what will be Arthur's journey.

Be ready to travel through an unknown underground line and discover a strange underground life.

Talk to people a find a way to go back home.
